weather.question: I fall from the sky, and you can splash in me. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I'm wet!
☔ You need an umbrella when I fall.
☁️ I come from the clouds.

weather.question: I am big and bright and hot. I make you feel warm. What am I?

hints.text: ☀️ You can see me during the day.
🕶️ You need sunglasses when I'm out.
🔥 I am very hot!

weather.question: I am white and fluffy and float in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🐑 I look like sheep.
✈️ Airplanes fly through me.
💧 I can turn into rain.

weather.question: I make the leaves dance in the trees. What am I?

hints.text: 🍃 I can be gentle or strong.
🪁 You can fly a kite with me.
🌬️ I am made of moving air.

weather.question: I am cold and white, and I fall from the sky in winter. What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ I am made of ice.
⛄ You can build a snowman with me.
🥶 I am very cold.

weather.question: I come after the rain, and I have many colors. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I look like a colorful arc.
☀️ I need the sun and rain to appear.
✨ I have red, orange, yellow, green, blue, indigo, and violet.

weather.question: I rumble and flash in the sky during a storm. What am I?

hints.text: ⚡ I am very bright.
⛈️ I often come with thunder.
💡 I am a powerful spark of electricity.

weather.question: I am like frozen rain, and I can bounce when I fall. What am I?

hints.text: 🧊 I am made of ice.
🤕 Be careful, I can hurt if I hit you.
⚽ I am sometimes small, like a pea, or bigger!

weather.question: I am a very strong wind that spins around and around. What am I?

hints.text: 🌪️ I can cause a lot of damage.
🏠 You should take shelter when I am near.
🌀 I look like a funnel cloud.

weather.question: I am a thick cloud near the ground that makes it hard to see. What am I?

hints.text: 🌫️ I am often seen in the morning.
🚗 You have to drive slowly when I'm around.
👻 I make everything look blurry.

animal.question: I quack and waddle. I like to swim in a pond. What am I?

hints.text: 💛 I am often yellow when I'm little.
🍞 People often feed me bread.
🦆 I have a wide, flat beak.

animal.question: I say 'Moo!' I give you milk. What am I?

hints.text: 🐄 I am big and black and white, or brown.
🌱 I like to eat grass.
🥛 You can drink what I produce.

animal.question: I bark and wag my tail. I love to play fetch. What am I?

hints.text: 🦴 I love to chew on bones.
🐕 I am a good friend to humans.
🎾 I like to chase balls.

animal.question: I meow and purr. I like to chase mice. What am I?

hints.text: 🧶 I like to play with string.
🐈 I can be black, white, orange or grey.
🥛 I like to drink milk

animal.question: I have a long trunk and big ears. I live in the jungle. What am I?

hints.text: 🥜 I love to eat peanuts.
🐘 I am very big and grey.
🚿 I can use my nose as a shower.

animal.question: I swing from trees and eat bananas. What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 I like to play.
🌴 I live in the rainforest
🙉 I make a chattering sound

animal.question: I have black and white stripes and live in Africa. What am I?

hints.text: 🦓 I look like a horse.
🌿 I eat grass.
🦓 Every one of us has different stripes.

animal.question: I roar and have a mane. I am the king of the jungle. What am I?

hints.text: 🦁 I am a cat, but a very big one.
🍖 I like to eat meat.
👑 I'm known as the 'King of the Jungle'

animal.question: I hop and have long ears. I love to eat carrots. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I have a fluffy tail.
🐇 I like to live in a burrow.
🐰 Some people keep me as a pet

animal.question: I slither and have no legs. Some people are afraid of me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐍 I have scales
🐭 I might eat mice.
🐍 I can be green, brown, yellow, or a combination!
